long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you run a dropshipping business without a team. If you are the boss and your team, OneManDrop is the platform for you. All the features you need to run your business.

Stores:
- Handle multiple Shopify stores. No limits.
- Define product price calculations standards for each store
- Publish products to your Shopify store

Products:
- Capture all data from AliExpress automaticaly with Chrome Extension
- Sale price calculator for products
- Image edition features
- Image background removal
- Title and product description generated using AI
- Size tables in standard html format at store

And soon:

Mining:
- Data from Meta Ads
- Ads creatives export

Social Media:
- Automatic Social Media posting
- Automatic generation of creatives for ads
